short_summary: tender for In Situ Remediation Program
description: This is the Phase 2 solicitation following an Invitation to Qualify.  Only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid.
full_summary:
### Phase 2 EZ897-240723 Fireside In Situ Remediation Program
#### Solicitation Notice

**Contract Identifier:** WS4174194746-Doc4225534176
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Publication Date:** September 22, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** October 12, 2023, at 14:00:00

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Phase 2 solicitation for the EZ897-240723 Fireside In Situ Remediation Program as a result of an Invitation to Qualify. Only qualified suppliers have been invited to participate in this solicitation.

**Solicitation Details:**
* **Scope of Work:** This solicitation is for the provision of in situ remediation services at the Fireside site.
* **Procurement Category:** Construction Services and Environmental Services.
* **Trade Agreements:** This solicitation is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* **Regions of Delivery:** British Columbia.
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** Not specified, but the expected contract end date is February 28, 2024.

**Evaluation and Selection Criteria:**
The proposals will be evaluated based on the **lowest price**.

**Contact Information:**
Serdar Eskicakit, Acquisition Specialist
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
E-mail: [serdar.eskicakit@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:serdar.eskicakit@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL:**
None.

This solicitation will be awarded to the responsive bidder with the lowest evaluated price. Bidders are responsible for ensuring their bid is submitted on time and complete.

### Terms and Conditions
This solicitation and any subsequent contract will be governed by the terms and conditions outlined in [insert URL or document].
